questions: Which has more inertia, a cricket ball or a rubber ball of the same size ? Give reason for your answer.
answers: Inertia of a body depends on its mass. A cricket ball has more mass than a rubber ball, thus it has greater inertia.

questions: When a carpet is beaten with a stick it releases dust. Explain why ?
answers: As dust possess inertia of rest, it resists the change and falls down.

questions: Why does a person in a bus tends to fall forward, when it stops suddenly ?
answers: When the driver of the bus in which a person is travelling applies brakes suddenly, the person tends to move forward due to inertia.
